DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose project determine whether school personnel implement two-tier School-wide Positive Behavior Support ( SWPBS , evidence base intervention ) program typically develop child well child , risk , externalize anxiety disorder implement component program level fidelity , integrity clinical effectiveness receive low level support ( consultation ) coach supervisor high level support ( consultation coaching ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Demonstrating school personnel implement evidence base intervention ( EBIs ) externalize anxiety problem high degree fidelity , integrity clinical effectiveness could spur initiative toward adoption EBIs urban school , thus lower health disparity setting . The overall purpose project determine whether school personnel implement two-tier School-wide Positive Behavior Support ( SWPBS , evidence base intervention ) program typically develop child well child , risk , externalize anxiety disorder implement component program level fidelity , integrity clinical effectiveness receive low level support ( consultation ) coach supervisor high level support ( consultation coaching ) . This study target six school within Philadelphia School District ( PSD ) . Within 6 school , research participant consist student ( grade 4-8 ) school staff member . The investigator evaluate 1 ) effectiveness SWPBS consultation coaching , compare baseline SWPBS consultation ; reduce office discipline referral ( ODRs ) improve school climate , child 's grade , diagnostic status , symptom severity impairment ; 2 ) effectiveness SWPBS consultation coaching , compare SWPBS consultation , increase program fidelity integrity .
DOC.criteria: All 6 participate school include Tier 1 . The inclusion criterion Tier 2 include child grade 38 , refer school staff member behavioral emotional difficulty receive 3 Office Discipline Referrals . Children consent participate project . There exclusion criterion Tier 1 . The exclusion criterion Tier 2 include child grade 38 whose family choose consent screen participate intervention , Special Education classification `` Intellectual Disability '' , able communicate English , history psychotic autistic spectrum disorder .
